attributes.action: We Want Navitus Bay Wind Farm
attributes.additional_details:
Our elected council seems determined to stop the Wind Farm even though it would create jobs, create enough energy for approximate 700,000 homes.

Bournemouth Council is outdated and wasting our money over £65,000 to date on fighting this project. I believe this will be good for Dorset. But the No vote is the only one that seems to have a voice. If you believe that Navitus Bay should go ahead. Show your support.

Find out more information yourself here http://www.navitusbaywindpark.co.uk/bournemouth The echo has done a great peace looking at the real effect of wind farms on the local economy after looking at Margate that has a wind farm much closer from the coast than this proposal.

http://www.bournemouthecho.co.uk/news/briefing/navitus/navitus_stories/11622603.Three_windfarms_and_the_council_that_backed_them___our_special_report_from_Margate/
